name: happypack

scripts.coverage:ci: nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > tmp/coverage.lcov && codecov --disable search -f tmp/coverage.lcov
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test:webpack1 && npm run test:webpack2 && npm run test:webpack3 && npm run test:webpack4 && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:coverage: nyc --silent npm run test:webpack1 && nyc --silent --no-clean npm run test:webpack2 && nyc --silent --no-clean npm run test:webpack3 && nyc --no-clean npm run test:webpack4
